content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** -this pdf pattern is available in english only in us terminology -the finished product will be ~ 13 in x 10 in 33 cm x 25 cm -this pattern is beginner friendly and mainly uses the single_crochet stitch -follow me on instagram @curiouspapaya for the latest updates
